Text:
Here’s what the infrastructure bill we passed means for New York and this country:

Jobs. Jobs. Jobs.
More local jobs.
More good-paying jobs.
More union jobs.

Watch me and @BradLander in our virtual town hall: https://t.co/7HcYPRB6WM
Good luck to @NYCFC today. Bring home the cup! #ForTheCity https://t.co/2ZjAyPkiRK

No amount of trickery from the GOP will change the fact their tax cuts for the rich added nearly $2T to the deficit while Dems are working to lower costs, create good-paying jobs, cut middle-class taxes, and ensure the biggest corporations and wealthiest few pay their fair share.

I co-hosted a town hall with the great @BradLander on how to use money from the infrastructure bill we passed to make our city more resilient and just

Brad's a tireless advocate for thoughtful infrastructure spending—I look forward to continuing to partner with him on this work https://t.co/srD1Snp18Y

The Supreme Court is allowing the #SB8 challenge to go ahead, but their refusal once again to block Texas’ unconstitutional abortion ban puts millions in harm's way.

The Senate will vote on the Women’s Health Protection Act to protect abortion rights.

To fight inflation and lower costs, the best thing to do is pass Build Back Better—and it's just what we're working to do

While GOP tries to undo measures that fight COVID and help families:

We're focused on raising wages, lowering costs, and creating jobs with #BuildBackBetter

We're the only developed nation without national paid family & medical leave standards for all families

We’re 1 of only 7 countries in the world to not guarantee paid leave for new moms

I’m working hard for national, comprehensive paid family & medical leave in #BuildBackBetter https://t.co/XY70K8dFhl
I believed in you from day one, @SBWorkersUnited. A truly momentous day for the WNY labor community. https://t.co/ILOjm8SqZz

Happy Birthday to my good friend @GillibrandNY! 

It has been an honor to work side-by-side with you for the people of New York.

The number of Americans filing for unemployment last week was the smallest since 1969. 
 
The American Rescue Plan we passed is driving the strongest jobs recovery in modern history.

We passed the American Rescue Plan and the infrastructure bill. We’ve successfully vaccinated hundreds of millions of Americans. 
 
Jobs are up. Wages are up. Families have more money in their pockets
Congratulations to @SBWorkersUnited on their groundbreaking effort in solidarity and proving Buffalo is and always will be a union town. Next up: fair contract! https://t.co/4No1QOeRuE

We’ve added nearly six million jobs this year.

That’s the most jobs of any president’s first year in history.

Storms that we used to label “once-in-a-century” now slam us year after year.

We're working to pass Build Back Better to fight the climate crisis, lower emissions, make communities more resistant to disasters, and protect our planet for the next generation.

New York is a union town. And I still stand with UAW Local 2110 Columbia grad student workers @SW_Columbia fighting for better pay, benefits, and working conditions.

The Columbia University administration must quickly forge a fair contract for its hard-working grad workers.

I’m working with @SenBooker and @RonWyden to pass our Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act to end federal prohibition.

It's long past time to end the federal prohibition on marijuana and ensure equity for communities impacted by the War on Drugs. https://t.co/fqhkEgqsgj

The Child Tax Credit has helped so many families

More than 36 million families will get their next Child Tax Credit payment on December 15

We're working to pass Build Back Better by Christmas to extend the Child Tax Credit & ensure they’ll get their checks in January and beyond
Student loan payments resume in 54 days. Today would be a great day for President Biden and Vice President Harris to #CancelStudentDebt.

I’m standing with @SenWarren and @RepPressley because new data from @RooseveltInst is showing that restarting student loan payments will undermine economic progress for so many families.

President Biden can #CancelStudentDebt today. https://t.co/PTBJMLRBZZ

President Biden is putting the full might of his admin behind clean, sustainable products and services to ensure the federal government achieves net-zero emissions by 2050.

Build Back Better is a key part of how we will get there. We are committed to getting it done. https://t.co/XAI7IX59Ec
Get vaccinated. Get boosted. And stay safe. https://t.co/QhKxiyB1Yr

Senate GOP plan to push an anti-vaccine proposal to overturn @POTUS's vaccine requirements for businesses.

No. We're in the middle of a health crisis.

We can't take away critical tools that can help us end the pandemic, but that’s what the GOP proposal would do. https://t.co/P7idruCVzd

Americans are still pulling themselves out of a once-in-a-century economic crisis due to COVID.

We're working to pass Build Back Better to cut costs for families, for health care, prescription drugs, child care, and more.

The DOJ is taking action against the terrible maps in Texas that violate the Voting Rights Act

Because the right to vote is the beating heart of Democracy

And in the Senate, we will continue the fight for voting rights and the fight to restore the VRA

https://t.co/yanXhZlvvb

The pause on student loan payments amid COVID has helped so many—but most say they're not financially secure enough to resume payments in February.

@POTUS can exercise his existing legal authority and #CancelStudentDebt to help millions of Americans struggling under this burden. https://t.co/fk7OLuCzv4

Gil Hodges was a titan of baseball.

And he was a central part of the Brooklyn community: I remember the excitement of being able to trick-or-treat at his house when I was a kid!

I’ve been pushing for him to be inducted to @BaseballHall, and I'm thrilled that he finally is.

80 years ago today, 2,403 Americans lost their lives and more were injured in the attack on Pearl Harbor.

We remember them and their families. We owe a debt to them and to all who served and sacrificed for our country in World War II.

Build Back Better will provide the largest investment in child care in American history to help make it cheaper for parents to raise kids

From free universal Pre-K for millions of families to extending the Child Tax Credit, we're working to get these things done before Christmas

Creating Jobs, lowering costs, fighting climate change, and keeping more money in people’s pockets—these are things Americans want and what Americans need, and it’s what Build Back Better does.

Senate Democrats are working to get these things done before Christmas.

Breaking: We just confirmed Jessica Rosenworcel to be Chair of the @FCC

She's set herself apart as one of America’s leading champions for a more affordable and accessible high-speed internet

Under her leadership, the FCC will make immense progress to address the digital divide

More than 2.4 million New Yorkers and tens of millions of Americans across the country are struggling under the crushing burden of student loan debt.

President Biden can use his existing legal authority to lift this burden with the stroke of a pen and #CancelStudentDebt.

Today, we'll move forward on Jessica Rosenworcel's nomination to be @FCC Chair

She's had nearly a decade of experience as an FCC Commissioner

She's a fierce advocate for closing the digital divide and protecting net neutrality

And she'd be the first-ever woman to chair the FCC
Student loan payments resume in 57 days. Today would be a great day for President Biden and Vice President Harris to #CancelStudentDebt.

American families need help affording things like child care, pre-K, prescription drugs, health care, and more.

We are working to pass the Build Back Better Act by Christmas to get them the help they need.

NEW: FEMA is announcing it’s delivered over $460 million to NYC for costs incurred in the early days of COVID helping to shelter people that didn't have a safe place to isolate and quarantine.

I will keep working to quickly deliver funding to NYC as we continue to battle COVID.
An incredible day for NYC’s 11th City Council District in the Bronx swearing in @EricDinowitzNYC! https://t.co/p2sYmfEHFb
The @Central_Astoria Holiday Festival and Tree Lighting Celebration in Astoria Park in Queens!🎄 https://t.co/kynhPwF7Hg

Gil Hodges was a great Brooklyn Dodger, an original Met, a manager of the Mets.

He was a Marine in WWII and fought in Tinian and Okinawa. He was awarded the Bronze Star with Combat V.

I’ve been pushing for him to be inducted to @BaseballHall, and tonight he finally is.

It was an honor to help celebrate 25 years of the American Association of Physicians of Indian Origin of Queens and Long Island. So many have been on the front lines of this COVID public health crisis, and we won’t stop fighting for them. https://t.co/orWlPZ8yc3

With Omicron, expanding access to at-home tests ASAP is critical.

As the admin preps to require insurers to reimburse for at-home tests:

American Rescue Plan funds can foot the cost for a surge of FREE at-home tests in the meantime to community health centers for distribution. https://t.co/xK6uLJC3wL
Good luck to @NYCFC in your first-ever Eastern Conference Final today! #ForTheCity #NYCFC https://t.co/XhZnEVIpdP
Happy to join the Queens Civic Congress’s annual legislative reception with so many leaders fighting for the community and for New York! https://t.co/ZDrwpXM9Lb

Today, we celebrated the induction of Keisha Alleyne, the next Civil Court Judge in Brooklyn’s 7th Municipal District.

A talented legal mind, she is compassionate, a woman of integrity, and someone who cares about her community and the impact she will have on it from the bench. https://t.co/j8E1OR2IWA
It was fun to visit the New York Botanical Garden @NYBG Holiday Train Show with Noah! https://t.co/FusRddULVY

Welcome to the family of nations, Barbados. It is right where you belong.

I can’t wait for our next Caribbean Day Parade in New York when we can all celebrate together. Here’s our celebration from this past summer! https://t.co/gtV18chUL4

You’re definitely going to want to watch what happened when @JohnLegend, @WeDemandJustice, and I sat down to talk about Dale Ho—an incredible voting rights lawyer I recommended to @POTUS to become a federal judge. https://t.co/M0FQc1ncuY

Thank you so much to @JohnLegend and @WeDemandJustice for sitting down to talk about Dale Ho.

Dale Ho is one of American’s foremost voting rights lawyers, just the kind federal judge we need on the bench. https://t.co/Z7dBih65LM

Get vaccinated.
And get your booster.

It’s the best protection against hospitalization and death from COVID. https://t.co/mDeBOnhGKg

Making child care and pre-K more affordable.

Fighting against the climate crisis.

Bringing costs under control.

Creating the jobs of tomorrow.

Build Back Better represents the largest investment in the American people in generations, and we're working to get this done.

As the first Jewish Senate Majority Leader in history:

I was so honored to join @POTUS, @FLOTUS, @VP, @SecondGentleman, and so many more for the White House Menorah Lighting tonight!

#HappyHanukkah https://t.co/nAO3owyFfc

We’re standing together because this is perhaps the greatest threat to Roe v Wade we’ve seen in a generation.

#AbortionIsEssential.

And this Senate will vote on the Women’s Health Protection Act to protect abortion rights. https://t.co/V4gJrh9GXP

With voting rights under assault—it's only fitting that we elevate to the federal bench one America’s top voting rights experts to help safeguard democracy

Dale Ho is one of this country’s foremost voting rights lawyers

I introduced him today to the Senate Judiciary Committee https://t.co/v9BxorHZ9i

Thank you to @NydiaVelazquez @BrianKavanaghNY @ChrisMarteNYC @WEACT4EJ @NYCEJAlliance @LiUNA @NYLCV @NRDC @GOLESNYC @CooperSq @NMICnyc @CPHS_NY @CIRSEIU @CleanHealthyNY @NYSBCTC and the International Union of Operating Engineers for your support!
With the historic $15 billion we passed in the infrastructure bill to remove toxic lead pipes across the country, we will make huge progress toward creating a #LeadFreeNY. https://t.co/rwyjTrSIH8

Marijuana prohibition has disproportionately harmed young people of color. NY's taken important steps to address these harms.

We're working to pass the Cannabis Administration & Opportunity Act to bring the progress we've made in NY to the federal level

https://t.co/iDoxidzBnq
#SpotifyWrapped https://t.co/TpTLevKYrt

The best protection against hospitalization and death from COVID is getting vaccinated.

So to New Yorkers and Americans: Get vaccinated. And get the booster. https://t.co/ZQv24XaXTU

Dale Ho has set himself apart as one of America's best election and voting rights lawyers. He’s worked for @NAACP_LDF and @ACLU.

It’s why I recommended him to @POTUS.

I was proud to introduce him today to the Senate Judiciary Committee to serve as an SDNY district court judge. https://t.co/dIALATd6KX

HBCUs are essential to making higher education accessible for ALL Americans.

We must ensure they have the support they need so that their doors remain open for generations to come.

We'll keep working on this important legislation until we get it done.

https://t.co/An4CTfaw71

Abortion is a fundamental right.

We're rallying at SCOTUS because they’re hearing arguments in a case that's perhaps the greatest threat to Roe v Wade in a generation.

The Senate will vote on the Women’s Health Protection Act to protect abortion rights.

https://t.co/VaLqWJC1LN
Noah’s helping light the menorah and eating a jelly donut for Hanukkah! https://t.co/IMtcTWcRBZ

With the infrastructure bill we passed, New York City is getting tens of millions in federal funds to expand our biking infrastructure.

It’s a #BikeBoom! https://t.co/2SEJBXk6Jr

Lowering child care costs and making pre-K universally accessible

Cutting taxes for parents and families

Taking bold steps to fight the climate crisis

Build Back Better will be largest investment in the American people we’ve seen in generations
It was an honor to help light the menorah tonight at the Israeli Embassy with @SenatorCardin and the new Ambassador @AmbHerzog! #HappyHanukkah https://t.co/yjiLRlJlPY

We secured a historic $15B in the infrastructure bill we passed to remove toxic lead pipes in NY and the US. I stood with @NydiaVelazquez, labor unions, and environmental justice groups to explain how with this $$$ we can GET THE LEAD OUT and create thousands of union jobs. https://t.co/TXFsiNluOv
I am so thankful for my dear friend and the tireless fighter for working people in New York — La Luchadora! — @NydiaVelazquez! https://t.co/17xHi0gE3D

We've lost over 100,000 Americans to overdose in just 12 months.

NYers of all backgrounds are united in a vision of a NY free from overdose, grounded in evidence, compassion, and care.

Thank you to the leadership of NY groups like @VOCALNewYork, @DPA_NY, and @EndOverdoseNY.

Build Back Better represents the largest investment in the American people in generations.

We will make child care and pre-K more affordable.

We will fight against the climate crisis.

We will bring costs under control.

We will create the jobs of tomorrow.
Get vaccinated. And get your booster. https://t.co/Iz44P1XMUS

This is the eulogy I gave for my dad, Abe, at his funeral. He was the quiet, strong glue that kept our family so close, the kind of person that keeps our society strong. He was a shining example of the Greatest Generation. We love him and will miss him.
https://t.co/q3ARoNM7Io
Hate has no place in Nassau County, in New York, or across this country. I will keep working to fight racism and hatred. https://t.co/1T6IgSjj2Q
Wishing you and your family a Happy Thanksgiving!

My father Abe, 98, passed away this evening

In so many ways—he personified the greatest generation. He took whatever was thrown at him no matter how difficult, did his job, never complained. An amazing husband, parent, grandparent, great-grandparent. We love him & will miss him. https://t.co/gUbdAp3Jr1

This is a step forward in Ahmaud Arbery’s family receiving the justice they deserve.

He should still be alive today.

One single verdict in a single trial will never be enough. https://t.co/czVtB6lhAZ

I've long pushed for expanded US investment in electric vehicle infrastructure

The infrastructure bill delivers over $12B to build out EV charging infrastructure & purchase electric transit, school buses—meaning more accessible EV chargers & less air pollution across NY & the US
Did ya hear the one about the girl, the scholarship, and the trip around the world? https://t.co/eeTiklFn22

The Broadway Junction station will soon become more accessible for all to use, thanks to the infrastructure bill and a $15M RAISE grant I fought to deliver.

I advocated for these upgrades so that New Yorkers with disabilities have the access to mass transit that they deserve. https://t.co/qK4OSYJYdJ

A disproportionate burden of student debt falls on Black borrowers.

President Biden can use executive authority to #CancelStudentDebt and help close the racial wealth gap.
https://t.co/LKh25oqafK

I have been riding my bike around New York City for a long time. And I’m so proud of the changes we’re about to make.

With this infrastructure bill, we’re getting tens of millions in federal funds to expand our biking infrastructure! #BikeBoom https://t.co/GFJ5Bb78Kp

It’s a #BikeBoom!

New York City is poised to land tens of millions in federal funds from our infrastructure bill to expand our biking infrastructure to help with bike lanes and jobs and climate and equality. https://t.co/0u3v2UtB1d

The War on Drugs has been a war on people—particularly people of color.
 
We must end the federal prohibition on marijuana and make criminal justice reforms—I’m working with @SenBooker and @RonWyden to pass our Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act to do just that. https://t.co/tDsMlr7o7I

Good news for families.

I called for this to provide relief at the pump and signal to OPEC they can't manipulate supply to inflate gas prices.

Of course—the only long term solution is to keep working to eliminate fossil fuel dependence and create a robust green energy economy. https://t.co/KvjmwmSbGz

I worked with @RepBowman to secure a nearly $12M RAISE Grant for New Rochelle. This will transform the unfinished Memorial Highway into open green space, reconnect the community to the downtown, and improve access to new job opportunities. https://t.co/2vjcMLGfjo

I was proud to stand with @RepJeffries, @SenatorPersaud, @JabariBrisport, @SandyforCouncil, @TheRealLatriceW, @RidersAlliance, @BrooklynBCID, @DIA_NewYork, @RiseAndResistNY, and so many more who advocated for these improvements to Broadway Junction!

With the infrastructure bill and because I encouraged @SecretaryPete to support this:

MTA's been awarded a $15M grant to make Broadway Junction station more accessible for ALL to use, and disabled New Yorkers will have the access and accommodations they need and deserve. https://t.co/gVQAQjF2FU

On Long Island, 13 school districts were hit by cyber-attacks & data breaches between 2018 and 2020

I worked hard to include a new $1B cybersecurity grant program in the infrastructure bill to help protect & prevent future cyber-attacks on schools in Long Island, NY, and the US https://t.co/yhlsOe0jQf

With the passage of the infrastructure bill, over $65B is on its way to households nationwide, ensuring communities in NY and across America have access to affordable high-speed internet, digital skills and digital literacy education, and existing programs to connect rural areas.
We’re praying for the victims of horrific violence at the Waukesha Christmas Parade. https://t.co/4Vg0fOGjjQ
Happy Birthday Noah, turning 3 years old this week! And wishing you so many more! https://t.co/LK6zdNHXQn

I stood at @SAVEEastHarlem with @RepEspaillat, @AlvinBraggNYC, & families who've lost loved ones to gun violence & were helped by these Community Violence Intervention programs

These proven programs work

I'm working for billions to fund them in NY & the US in Build Back Better https://t.co/1GB3urLDQ8
The first mezuzah ever hung on the doorpost of the Vice President’s Residence, by the @VP and @SecondGentleman! https://t.co/Z1Bogh98Ld
Happy Birthday, President Biden! https://t.co/1NZ9Y3ryhb

I was incredibly honored to speak at the historic swearing-in of Damian Williams as US Attorney for the Southern District of NY—the first Black US Attorney in the role.

He's immensely talented, committed to equal justice under the law.

I was so proud to recommend him to @POTUS! https://t.co/EXuHHRQ0ii

In August, I called on the Texas School Board urging them to remove their funds from Greenbrook Partners, a predatory private equity backed landlord displacing Brooklyn tenants. These practices are ongoing, and action is needed. I'm proud to stand with @BradLander in this fight. https://t.co/6369Ojk07j

The House has taken an important step to advance Build Back Better to cut middle-class taxes; invest in child care, universal pre-K, affordable housing; lower Rx costs; fight climate change; create jobs; more.

We will act as quickly as possible to get this bill to @POTUS’s desk.
If only Kevin McCarthy cared as much about helping people as he did about auditioning to speak at a Trump rally
